metadata.title: CVE-2023-52161 on Ubuntu 24.10 (oracular) - medium
metadata.description:
The Access Point functionality in eapol_auth_key_handle in eapol.c in iNetwireless daemon (IWD) before 2.14 allows attackers to gain unauthorizedaccess to a protected Wi-Fi network. An attacker can complete the EAPOLhandshake by skipping Msg2/4 and instead sending Msg4/4 with an all-zerokey.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-52161` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

iwd - 2.14-1ubuntu3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: iwd package in oracular, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.14-1ubuntu3').
